text: The Uchi Subprovince is a Neoarchean volcanic sequence in Manitoba, Canada. It is at the southern margin of the North Caribou terrane and comprises a number of greenstone belts, which contains volcanic rocks that record some 280 million years of volcanism. ==See also== *Volcanism of Canada *Volcanism of Western Canada ==References== Category:Volcanism of Manitoba Category:Greenstone belts Category:Neoarchean volcanism
title: Uchi Subprovince
